extendedInfo.description: Checkhimout is the online dating service that empowers women to take control over their experience. Dating is made as fun and easy as shopping in this man-object store where the customer really is queen!Checkhimout differentiates from other dating websites by only giving women the possibility to initiate conversation with potential matches. Men, in order to earn good chances of being picked out by the siteâs shoppers, must thus optimize their profiles. Women are spared from messages from unwanted suitors, while men have the assurance that all their matches are truly interested.More than ever before, shopping for the man of your dreams âor getting checked out by a gorgeous buyerâ is at your immediate reach. Whether at home, at the office or on the move, stay connected at all times!Brighten up your daily routine and live at the pace of your flings with the Checkhimout mobile app. Download the application for free and obtain all of the websiteâs features directly on your smartphone. With its direct access to thousands of members, slick and intuitive interface, innovative services and nationwide exposure, it will seduce you instantly!You dreamed of an online dating experience where harassment and rejection are banned and where finding the match of your dreams is as simple, pleasant and fun as a shopping spree? Checkhimout made it happen!The Checkhimout distinction:100% real profiles guaranteed//Ladies - no harassment//Gentlemen - no rejection//No monthly subscription//Protection of user personal data//Superior confidentiality//59% female members//Nationwide coverageLadies, on top of offering you an entirely free platform to shop for the object of your desire, Checkhimout.com grants you full power! Connect with delectable man-objects at your own pace in a safe, fun, harassment-free environment where your comfort is always emphasized. As to you, gentlemen, enjoy the increased ego-boost of getting individually picked out from the Checkhimout shelves by truly interested women. All will enjoy the application format and its direct connection to the Internetâs one and only love market, right at the convenience of a smartphone. â¨â¨Each day, hundreds of bargain-hungry shoppers connect to Checkhimout to pursue their dream date. And because our site is devoted to women, they keep coming back! Wait no longer; sign up now with 3 simple clicks and create your profile entirely FREE.â¨The application allows you to:â¨- Create your profile and your private albumâ¨- Browse an unlimited amount of profiles and public albums- Conduct quick and advanced searchesâ¨- Discover the members that meet your search criteria- Send and receive crush alertsâ¨- Browse your list of crushes â¨- Add members to your shopping bag/favorites listâ¨- Bock membersâ¨- Browse the site in peace with the âappear offlineâ mode- Contact customer serviceGentlemen, for an enhanced experience and the best chance to connect with your preferred shoppers, we urge you to discover our new pay-as-you-go credit packs and their special advantages:- Exchange private messages â¨- Get read message receipts â¨- Send virtual gifts â¨- Get opened gift receipts â¨â¨- Request access to a private album â¨Checkhimout offers a single, hassle-free credit pack to suit your every need:- Mobile Pack: 1000 credits for $29.99â¨This basic package gives you plenty of value for your money. Exchange with your favorite shoppers on a pay-as-you-go basis, send them gifts they will love, and maximize your chances of finding your dream date.If you already have a Checkhimout account, please connect with your usual login information. Likewise, if you have purchased credits on the website, you may continue to use them on the mobile application.Any comments, questions or suggestions? Send us your feedback at support@checkhimout.com

reviews.title: Don\'t bother wasting your time

reviews.comment: Tried to add pictures over a dozen times. Each time was kick offline as error message. To big a hassle. Needs some work and ways to contact them.  Very poor app.\tVery poor app

reviews.title: Didn\'t work
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy Note 2. Tried uploading photos and it crashes every time. Tried search, doesn\'t work. Tried looking at a visitor\'s profile and couldn\'t look at their photos. What\'s the point?
reviews.author: Kat B

reviews.title: Questionable women that are to far away flirting.
reviews.comment: Sounds almost scammish, when men join, and drop dead hot women from way to far away start flirting, but people in your own town don\'t. I say men, if you get fake profile flirts, start posting your own fake profile, log out, and never use that site again...      The site owners will get sign ups, but no money coming in from the sign ups, waist of bandwith for them.     I think that should be the common tactic men should use testing out dating site apps.
reviews.author: Charles R Hatton

reviews.title: Login issues
reviews.comment: Won\'t bring up the keyboard when imputting my logon info on an EVO 4G... Till that gets fixed it\'s useless
reviews.author: Michael Lind

reviews.title: Don\'t install
reviews.comment: Won\'t allow me to sign in

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Total waste of time... app cant and wont open up. Hard to uninstall. If I could give negative stars I would..... ladies go right by this app....

reviews.title: Gadzook
reviews.comment: Timothy Aaron Gadberry  gives you a hardcore rating. I rate is 3 out of 5 stars. it is very corny and it\'s something I would not recommend. if you are sitting around and you\'re bored and you have nothing to do then you can download it and then  mess around with it, check it out and then uninstall it and be done with it .. who knows you might like it but I doubt it. there\'s your rating. rated by Timothy Aaron get very Yukon Oklahoma.
reviews.author: TIMOTHY GADBERRY

reviews.title: Gadzook
reviews.comment: Timothy Aaron gadberry rates this cheesy app 2 out of 5 on the star list, I do not recommend it, if your a lonely looking for love in the wrong places sad negative depressed person than this apps for you and only you, I doubt if there\'s anyone else out there that would want it, I never rate anything at  1 and I never write anything at 5 so I actually overrated it by giving it 2, however it is a free app and you might be that one person so you can download and instal and if you\'re not that person uninstall.\342\200\246
reviews.author: Timothy Gadberry
